title: Broadening Research Findings
text: If another researcher can replicate the results, it means that the findings could be generalized to other research settings.

title: Testing Validity
text: It is important that a replication of the experimentation yield similar results, to ensure validity of method and result.

title: Relevance
text: Another researching replicating the study means that it is relevant to the interests of many different scientists in the scientific community.
